accessible.title: Accessibility
accessible.description: Aligning my applications with WIA-ARIA specs during development and testing. It's so satisfying to build apps that are inclusively targeting folks with impairments.

responsive.title: Responsiveness
responsive.description: I am striving to be a mobile-first kind of developer. One of my development checklists is to make sure an application is widely accessible from all sorts of devices with different screen sizes.

optimization.title: Optimization
optimization.description: Lightweight engineered, offline accessible with PWA, and SEO optimized application, that is hitting a home run my friend.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Documenting UI and UX of reusable components of an application by creating style guides and design systems for the app.
